content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electric pole at position (3.9, 3.1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole (position (3.9, 3.1))

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to attribute access on ElectricityGroup
- Ensure that the attributes you are trying to access on the ElectricityGroup object exist. For example, the 'energy' and 'connection_points' attributes do not exist on this object, leading to AttributeError. Verify the correct attributes in the documentation before accessing them.

### Errors when electric pole is not plugged into the electric network
- The electric pole at position (3.9, 3.1) has been reported as NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK. Check the connections to ensure that the pole is properly connected to an electric network to avoid this issue.
